mapper.select: select s.material_number ,m.material_name ,m.material_classification ,m.unit ,m.unit ,m.sale_unitprice ,s.stock_count ,s.safety_stock from store_stock s join material m on s.material_number = m.material_number where s.store_number = 111 order by m.material_number

select o.order_Day ,m.material_Name ,'본사' ,m.sale_Unitprice ,d.count ,i.remain_Stock_Count ,i.expiration_Limit From store_Order o join Order_Details D on o.order_number = d.order_number join store_in i on i.order_details_number = d.order_details_number join material m on d.material_number = m.material_number where o.store_number = 111 AND o.order_number = #{materialNumber} order by order_day
